description: Advanced demo: Use web_navigator as a tool to research multiple websites and synthesize findings

inputs_schema.research_topic: What to research (e.g., 'competitor pricing for SaaS analytics tools')
inputs_schema.websites: List of websites to check (comma-separated URLs)

phases.name: plan_research
execute_research
phases.instructions:
Research: {{ input.research_topic }}

You have access to web_navigator tool which can browse websites for you.

For each website in {{ input.websites }}, use web_navigator to find relevant information.

Call web_navigator once per site with specific goals.

When you have data from all sites, route to synthesize.

rules.loop_until_prompt: Continue until you've gathered information from all websites about: {{ input.research_topic }}

phases.name: synthesize
phases.instructions:
Synthesize your research findings about {{ input.research_topic }}.

Create a structured report with:
1. Key findings from each website
2. Comparisons and patterns
3. Recommendations

Be concise but comprehensive.
